version_description:
- Game runs much smoother, especially on older iOS devices now
- New achievements (up to 23000 points)
- iOS7 status bar is hidden in game now.
- Launching the app doesn't cause music to be stopped
- Some minor bugs are fixed

New logo and icon
Bug fixes

Don't forget to download our new online okey game: "Okey Pro"
Fixed the iOS 7.1 compatibility

- Points converted to coins
- Introduced XP/level system
- New app icon
- Various improvements and bug fixes

Try our new game 'Okey Pro'
